title: Laundering woollen blankets in hospitals
brief_description: How woollen blankets which have been shrinkproofed and mothproofed may be laundered. The CSIRO’s shrink and mothproofing process; the advantages of woollen blankets; the basic procedures, which can be used in any hospital laundry with or without modern equipment.
